---
id: pix-list-policies-v-2
title: "List policies"
description: "Gets the list of DICT access limitation policies for the requesting participant. Each item in the list holds information about the status of the corresponding bucket at the time of the query."
sidebar_label: "List policies"
hide_title: true

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

custom_edit_url: null

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List policies"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/policies"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets the list of DICT access limitation policies for the requesting participant. Each item in the list holds information about the status of the corresponding bucket at the time of the query.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
